General.Name: Xiamen Jiarong Technology Corp. Ltd.
General.Description: Xiamen Jiarong Technology Corp.,Ltd. manufactures and sells environmental protection equipment. It offers containerized systems, DTRO and STRO skid mounted systems, tubular ultra-filtration membrane systems, disc type/spiral tube modules, and I-FLASH MVR. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Xiamen, China.
General.Address: No.1670, Butang Middle Road, Xiamen, China, 361102
